name: Multiply Express
description:
This game is a game to help with multiplying, making multiplying more fun with cute rabbits and with a challenge mode for anyone who wants to try different levels.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tools Used:

Godot Engine 3.4
Dialogic 1.4(DEV) plugin Made by Emilio Coppola.
Google Fonts (BalsamiqSans-Bold)
Aseprite 1.2.30
Ableton Live 11 Lite
VLC Media Player
Lenovo Thinkpad x280
Teenage Engineering OP-Z
Zoom H1n

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

version 2.9: All music is now finished.

version 2.8: Errors were fixed.

version 2.7: Grammar fixed.

version 2.3: Challenge mode (2-4[Easy]), (2-7[Medium]), (2-12[ Hard , Expert ].

version 2.2: Golden Rabbits are added. 

version 2.1: New credit menu was added and the game now has a name.

version 2.0: Little fixes on the Credit Menu

version 1.9: “How to play,” “credits” and “background were added.

version 1.8: Menu Fixed the word "Challange" to "Challenge"
